assignments.description: Assign the found value to the standard package name.
assignments.name: Assign_Standard_Package_Name
assignments.label: Assign Standard Package Name

decisions.name: Decision_APAC_MRR_Closed_won_Check_Auto_Renewal_Won
decisions.label: Decision - APAC MRR Closed won/Check Auto Renewal Won

rules.name: APAC_MRR_Closed_won_Non_Auto_Renewal_Won
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8 OR 10 OR (9 AND 11))
rules.label: APAC MRR Closed won/Non Auto Renewal Won

rules.name: APAC_MRR_Auto_Renewal_Closed_Won
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
rules.label: APAC MRR Auto Renewal Closed Won

rules.name: APAC_MRR_Closed_won_Platform_Transfer_OEM_Direct_Internal_Transfer
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR (8 AND 9))
rules.label: APAC MRR Closed won - Platform Transfer/OEM - Direct Internal Transfer

decisions.name: Decision_APAC_One_Off_Closed_Won
decisions.label: Decision - APAC One Off Closed Won?

rules.name: Yes_APAC_One_Off_Closed_Won
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Yes - APAC One Off Closed Won

rules.name: Non_Auto_Renewal_Send_Email_to_Legal_Team
rules.label: Non Auto Renewal - Send Email to Legal Team

decisions.name: Decision_EMEA_MRR_Closed_won_Check_Auto_Renewal_Won
decisions.label: Decision - EMEA MRR Closed won/Check Auto Renewal Won

rules.name: EMEA_MRR_Closed_won_Non_Auto_Renewal_Won
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND (9 OR 10 OR 12 OR (11 AND (13 OR 14)))
rules.label: EMEA MRR Closed won/Non Auto Renewal Won

rules.name: EMEA_MRR_Auto_Renewal_Closed_Won
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11
rules.label: EMEA MRR Auto Renewal Closed Won

rules.name: EMEA_MRR_Closed_won_Platform_Transfer_OEM_Direct_Internal_Transfer
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND (9 OR (10 AND 11))
rules.label: EMEA MRR Closed won - Platform Transfer/OEM - Direct Internal Transfer

decisions.name: Decision_EMEA_One_Off_Closed_won
decisions.label: Decision - EMEA One Off Closed won

rules.name: Yes_EMEA_Professional_Service_Closed_Won
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
rules.label: Yes - EMEA Professional Service Closed Won

decisions.description: BODEV-1718: Send customer onboarding form when Renewal Opp is closed won.
decisions.name: Decision_Send_Customer_Billing_Onboarding_Form
decisions.label: Decision - Send Customer Billing Onboarding Form?

rules.name: Yes_Send_Form
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR (4 AND 5 AND 6)) AND (7 OR (8 AND 9 AND 10))
rules.label: Yes - Send Form

decisions.name: Decision_Set_Fields_based_on_Sales_Office
decisions.label: Decision - Set Fields based on Sales Office?

rules.name: Yes_Set_on_US
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 or 3 or 5) and 2) or ((1 or 3 or 5) and 4)
rules.label: Yes - Set on US

decisions.name: Decision_Type_Not_Referral_Account_Not_Customer
decisions.label: Decision - Type Not Referral, Account Not Customer

rules.name: Yes
rules.label: Yes - Type Not Referral, Account Not Customer

decisions.name: Decision_US_MRR_Closed_won_Check_Auto_Renewal_Won
decisions.label: Decision - US MRR Closed won/Check Auto Renewal Won

rules.name: US_MRR_Closed_won_Non_Auto_Renewal_Won
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND (9 OR 10 OR 12 OR (11 AND 13))
rules.label: US MRR Closed won/Non Auto Renewal Won

rules.name: US_MRR_Auto_Renewal_Closed_Won
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11
rules.label: US MRR Auto Renewal Closed Won

rules.name: US_MRR_Closed_won_Platform_Transfer_OEM_Direct_Internal_Transfer
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND (9 OR (10 AND 11))
rules.label: US MRR Closed won - Platform Transfer/OEM - Direct Internal Transfer

decisions.name: Decision_US_One_Off_Closed_Won
decisions.label: Decision - US One Off Closed Won?

rules.name: Yes_US_One_Off_Closed_Won
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
rules.label: Yes - US One Off Closed Won

decisions.description: Check if any records have been found
decisions.name: Enterprise_products_on_opportunity
decisions.label: Enterprise products on opportunity?

decisions.description: Check if a record has been found, if yes, assign the value for the standard package name to the opportunity.
decisions.name: Package_name_found
decisions.label: Package name found

decisions.description: Checks if the standard package name has already been populated. If it is populated, than an update is not needed as it is most likely still part of the "older" packaging and not using the new enterprise model.
decisions.name: Update_Standard_Package_for_Enterprise
decisions.label: Update Standard Package for Enterprise

Flow.description: BODEV - 4285 Update Standard Package Name Field to Include Enterprise Pricing package BODEV-4135 Opportunity Movements - removed formulas which are no longer used BODEV-4135 Opportunity Movements BODEV-3388 Changed the criteria for Internal Transfer Opportunities making ARR & MRR > 0 to prevent sending emails for 0 ARR/MRR opportunities

formulas.name: frmSalesOffice
formulas.expression: IF( {!varOpportunityRecord.Owner_Office__c}="Amsterdam", "Amsterdam", IF( {!varOpportunityRecord.Owner_Office__c}="Boston", "Boston", IF( {!varOpportunityRecord.Owner_Office__c}="San Mateo", "San Mateo", IF( {!varOpportunityRecord.Owner_Office__c}="San Carlos", "San Carlos", IF( {!varOpportunityRecord.Owner_Office__c}="Melbourne", "Melbourne", IF( {!varOpportunityRecord.Owner_Office__c}="Dubai", "Dubai", IF( {!varOpportunityRecord.Owner_Office__c}="London", "London", "" )))))))

formulas.name: frmSFMCOrderNeeded

Flow.label: Opportunity [ALF] Invoked: Closed Won

recordLookups.description: Get the opportunity DAM product. This record is then used to compare to the custom metadata type Standard Package to find the package name.
recordLookups.name: Get_Opportunity_Products
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunity Products

recordLookups.description: Get the corresponding value for the package name from the Standard package custom metadata type.
recordLookups.name: Get_standard_package_name
recordLookups.label: Get standard package name

subflows.name: Sub_Flow_Send_Customer_Billing_Onboarding_Form
subflows.label: Sub Flow - Send Customer Billing Onboarding Form

subflows.name: Sub_Flow_Update_Contacts_Status_to_Active_CS
subflows.label: Sub Flow - Update Contacts Status to Active CS

variables.description: Text to capture Partner Accounts' name under the Oppty except Salesforce. If multiple partners are involved, account names are concatenated with ", ".
variables.name: OtherPartner
